name: Toppenga
description:
You might have to wait a little for the drawings to appear.

A Twine game that I worked a lot on. It is supposed to be a descriptive platformer. Imagine if you were being described a video game and then made that a video game. That is the only way I can describe it.

172 passages and 156 drawings made.

Please tell me if there are any problems.

The drawings were made after the game was made. Many drawings were made out of order (I worked on the title screen after the around 6 pictures were already made). I had no idea what the character would be so I made up something quickly. Same with the Game Name.
